summary: After finding out that the hippie lifestyle isn't as glamorous as the media makes it look, Dennie comes home to find disapproval and judgment at every turn, and her sister Susie wanting to follow in her footsteps.
cast: Sally Field|Eleanor Parker|Lane Bradbury|David Carradine|Jackie Cooper|Jean Byron|Clarke Gordon|Harry Lauter|Eve McVeagh|Barry Russo
title: Maybe I'll Come Home in the Spring
